backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user approval, user profiles, and public form submissions using Map-based storage and mixin modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two About Us page enhancements with related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all routes and wraps the app with RouterProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/CallbackDialog.t: Dialog component containing a callback request form that submits data via useRequestCallback with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying logo, navigation links, contact details, and office locations using responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/GetQuoteDialog.t: A dialog component that lets users choose an insurance type and opens a prefilled WhatsApp message for quotes.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive site header with navigation, call button, and Get Quote dialog, including mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app with header and footer and renders routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/content/officeLocations.ts: Exports office location data with names and addresses.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoogleReviews.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for Google Reviews.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, loading, login, logout, and state management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting forms, requesting callbacks, and managing testimonials through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and insurance-themed color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx: Renders an About Us page with company story, core values, achievements, and mission statement using UI cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ClaimAssistancePage.t: Displays claim assistance steps, emergency contact details, and support features with structured cards and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/CompareEducatePage.ts: Provides educational insurance comparisons, including term vs endowment details, using cards and accordion sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, and contact information cards including phone, email, and locations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage featuring hero content, reasons to choose the service, insurance categories, and quick action dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with a list of insurance services and their details, using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Displays approved testimonials with admin delete options and provides a form for submitting new testimonials with ratings and optional video links.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing requirements and issues for fixing the About Us founder photo display and adding a short founder bio.
